ItemTooltips.stout_shield: If you find yourself being harassed during the early-game, a stout shield should put an end to it.
ItemTooltips.assault: Reduce everyone's armor so your illusions deal even more damage. Overall, this makes your army of illusions faster and stronger.
ItemTooltips.manta: With Manta style, you're doubling your ultimate's ability and thus, more critical strikes!
ItemTooltips.armlet: Be sure to activate Armlet before using Phantasm. The illusions get the bonus strength damage.
ItemTooltips.soul_ring: This is situational item depending how difficult your early-game is. Your mana pool is quite low during the early-phase and the game and if you're find yourself in a good position to snag some early kills or to be more defensive with the stuns and regen - pick this up.
ItemTooltips.ancient_janggo: We get drums for added chasing power and the extra free intelligence.
ItemTooltips.heavens_halberd: Keep foes down and you evading attacks with Heaven's Halberd. In most cases, this is an ideal item, but not always necessary.

AbilityTooltips.chaos_knight_chaos_bolt: Reality Rift before Stunning because of the range difference and due to the min-stun animation of reality rift. The stun duration for this ability is completely random, but the damage is the inverse of the stun.
AbilityTooltips.chaos_knight_reality_rift: Reality Rift has a better range than Chaos Bolt. Consider it first before using Chaos Bolt to keep your opponent near you for attacks.
AbilityTooltips.chaos_knight_phantasm: Combined with your Critical Strike, Phantasm will dish out even more damage than at level 6 alone. Due to its mana cost, you do not get this ability until around level 11.
